item1.name: Doran's Blade
item1.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item2.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item3.name: Zeal
item3.description:
18% Attack Speed
15% Critical Strike Chance
  • Zealous: Gain 7% Move Speed.

item4.name: Dagger
item4.description: 12% Attack Speed

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Hail of Blades
perk0.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

item3.name: Runaan's Hurricane
item3.description:
45% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Wind's Fury: When Attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (40% () Attack Damage) physical damage. Bolts apply On-Hit effects and can Critically Strike.

    Item is for Ranged champions only.

item4.name: Bloodthirster
item4.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20% Life Steal
  • Ichorshield: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a 50 - 350 (based on level) Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

item2.name: Blade of The Ruined King
item2.description:
40 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
12% Life Steal
  • Mist's Edge: Attacks apply physical damage On-Hit equal to (10% for Melee users | 6% for Ranged users) of the target's current Health.
  • Siphon: Attacking a champion 3 times deals 40 - 150 (based on level) magic damage and steals 25% Move Speed for 2 seconds (20s cooldown).

    Maximum Mist's Edge damage dealt to monsters and minions is 60.
    Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

20% Critical Strike Chance
35% Armor Penetration
  • Giant Slayer: Deal up to 15% bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.

    Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2000.

item3.name: Runaan's Hurricane
item3.description:
45% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Wind's Fury: When Attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (40% () Attack Damage) physical damage. Bolts apply On-Hit effects and can Critically Strike.

    Item is for Ranged champions only.

item4.name: Berserker's Greaves
item4.description:
35% Attack Speed
45 Move Speed

item5.name: Control Ward
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Hail of Blades
perk0.shortDesc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Gain 110% Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 8s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

item0.name: Bloodthirster
item0.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
20% Life Steal
  • Ichorshield: Life Steal from Attacks can now overheal you. Excess Health is stored as a 50 - 350 (based on level) Shield that decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

item1.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item1.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Wind's Fury: When Attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (40% () Attack Damage) physical damage. Bolts apply On-Hit effects and can Critically Strike.

    Item is for Ranged champions only.

item3.name: Guardian Angel
item3.description:
40 Attack Damage
40 Armor
  • Saving Grace: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% base Health and 30% max Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300s cooldown).

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.
